properties.name: jwt.access.secret
properties.description: Secret key for JWT access token

properties.name: jwt.access.expiration
properties.description: Expiration time (in seconds) for JWT access token

properties.name: jwt.refresh.secret
properties.description: Secret key for JWT refresh token

properties.name: jwt.refresh.expiration
properties.description: Expiration time (in seconds) for JWT refresh token

properties.name: minio.access_key
properties.description: Access key (aka user ID) of an account in MinIO.

properties.name: minio.secret_key
properties.description: Secret key (aka password) of an account in MinIO.

properties.name: minio.bucket
properties.description: Name of the bucket to be created in MinIO (if not exists).

properties.name: minio.public_endpoint
properties.description: The public-facing base URL used to construct links for clients to access files. This can be different from the internal `minio.endpoint`, especially when using a reverse proxy or CDN.

properties.name: app.frontend-url
properties.description: Address of the frontend application, used for CORS configuration.
